title: Mordekaiser
body:
I'm trying to understand the point of this champion.

damage? nope
CC? none
tank? he's squishy

What are you supposed to do with this piece of trash?

replies.body:
You build pure damage.

He has high ratios and his survivability relies on dishing out damage to fill his passive.

In other words; Suck at playing Morde and you'll feel like the squishiest piece of shit champion, actually get good at him and you'll never die.
well yah youll like 1 shot ppeople if you have triforce or lich bane on your q

Hey malicious you sound like someone that might be playing Morde (Kappa)

What do you max first generally when going top? I'm trying to make him work there and maxing W but that bramble and executioners really hurt that playstyle

I always max W.
If they build Bramblevest they're actively gimping their build since they're investing into Armor against a high-ap damage threat.

Executioner is a bit more annoying, since Morde can do to not AA during a trade and not even get affected by Bramblevest, but it's the same deal.
You don't max W solely for the heal anyways, it provides the best waveclear and damage when maxed first.

so you say maxing E against poke champs (lets say Kennen) is not an option?

So you poke them down harder and still have relatively good wave clear.

And I tend to go Gunblade rush into full magic Pen with a raba at the end... is that good? ^^

Smack things and play air guitar.
He is a difficult champion to work with and can be overly punishing if you are unsure of what to do with him.  Keep practicing and you will find something that works.
Damage, hell yes, but not if you build tank. CC hell no, CC overrated. He basically has spellvamp built into his kit, with his damage being pretty insane.
